txt.en: Aid those who seek to carry out the reclamation of Minas Ithil.
You dared to stand against those who would oppose the Reclamation of Minas Ithil, though it was a long and dangerous undertaking with little guarantee of success.

Every difficult task you undertook brought you one step closer to the goal of cleansing Minas Morgul and reclaiming Minas Ithil. Such hope cannot be assured, but if King Elessar wills it, the forces of Gondor and the Prince of Ithilien will seek to bring it about.
You have undertaken and conquered the five trials of Minas Morgul in order to put an end to the veil of sorcery, cast over the Dead City by dark forces.
Complete Vale of Sorcery: The Trial of Death
Aid those who seek to carry out the reclamation of Minas Ithil.
